clause-variation.deleted-text: F4P6 does not apply in NSW as the installation of hot water, warm water and cooling water systems (and their operation and maintenance) is regulated in the Public Health Regulation 2012, under the Public Health Act 2010.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Hot water, warm water and cooling water systems installed in a building must control the accumulation of harmful levels of micro-organisms.

callout.p: F4P6 does not apply to a system serving only a single sole-occupancy unit in a Class 2 or 3 building or Class 4 part of a building.
